channel.title: Lunar
channel.description:
Ok guys, so my source has Lunar spells built-in but my client doesnt reconize it at all.. Does anyone know how to add Lunar spells to my client. If so plaese explain. Any and all help is much apreciated
-Thanks
Zukyak

item.title: Lunar
item.dc:creator: @Zukyak Zukyak
item.description:
@Zukyak wrote:

glestrts:

its a code that you add to the class 9, ill try to find it for you.

That would be greatly apreciated.

Read full topic

item.title: Lunar
item.dc:creator: @alexahnon alexahnon
item.description:
@alexahnon wrote:

[quote=“Zukyak, post:3, topic:322610”][quote author=glestrts link=topic=418996.msg3078958#msg3078958 date=1262032942]
basically you need to extend your interfaces so that it is able to load custom ones, then find the lunar interface or C & P from bluurs client.

[/quote]

You shouldn’t be using any program at all. I don’t remember correctly but I think its something related to the Class9.java (Renamed is RSInterface) classes. Try looking there.

Ok I understood patr of that but how do I extend my interfaces? Do I use Lin’s interface maker or something of that sort?[/quote]

Read full topic
